snippet.title: Stellaris: Federations - Feature breakdown | Available March 17th
snippet.description:
Pre-order now! - Available March 17th.
The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting. With the Stellaris: Federations expansion, players can extend their diplomatic dominion over the galaxy like never before. Use every trick in the book to gain an edge on friend and foe alike, with a host of new options to influence, manipulate, and dominate without firing a shot.

Features include:
-        Expanded Federations.
-        Galactic Community.
-        Origins.
-        New constructions

Paradox on YouTube:
---------------------------------
ParadoxInteractive - http://youtube.com/ParadoxInteractive
Trailers, Feature Breakdowns, Dev Diaries, and more.

ParadoxExtra - http://youtube.com/ParadoxExtra
Gameplay of our video games, convention coverage, and other fun things from Paradox!

Paradox Grand Strategy - http://youtube.com/ParadoxGrandStrategy
Gameplay of our Grand Strategy Games. CK2, EU4, HOI4, Stellaris, and Imperator.
